template <typename T>
class vsip::impl::User_storage<std::complex<T>>
File: ../../../vsip/core/user_storage.hpp

User_storage specialization for complex types.

Can store user-storage in array format, interleaved format, or split format.

Primary template: User_storage

Return the user storage in a format acceptable for initializing a Storage class with array/interleaved format, or return NULL.

Return the user storage in a format acceptable for initializing a Storage class with split format, or return effective NULL.
